meanings.definition: Not making or based on careful distinctions; unselective
meanings.sent1: The indiscriminating shopper grabbed items randomly off the shelves.
meanings.sent2: She made an indiscriminating choice when picking a movie to watch.
meanings.sent3: The indiscriminating eater ended up with a strange mix of flavors on their plate.
meanings.sent4: His indiscriminating taste in music led him to discover new genres.
meanings.sent5: The indiscriminating cat pounced on anything that moved.

meanings.definition: Lacking in discernment or judgment; thoughtless
meanings.sent1: The indiscriminating driver changed lanes without checking for other cars.
meanings.sent2: Her indiscriminating comments hurt others without her realizing.
meanings.sent3: The indiscriminating student turned in a paper full of errors.
meanings.sent4: His indiscriminating behavior at the party caused embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The indiscriminating choice of words made the situation worse.
